FEXfunctions/
GeneralDataAnalyses/
ColSeries/
store/
autoRunDA/

firstPaper/
figures/
others/
testcode/

# Common files to ignore
*.mat
*.asv

# Image and data files
*.svg
*.png
*.m~

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db
